function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate blinding or adjustment for confounders in study design","Impact":"Exaggerating the effects of an intervention","Mitigation":"Implement proper blinding and adjust for confounders in study design","Technologies":"Statistical analysis tools for adjusting confounders","People":"Researchers, study designers","Owner":"Research institutions, funding agencies"},{"Description":"Inappropriate interventions and comparison causing problems with study designs","Impact":"Compromised study validity and reliability","Mitigation":"Carefully select appropriate interventions and controls for comparison","Technologies":"Clinical trial design software, expert consultation","People":"Researchers, study designers","Owner":"Research institutions, funding agencies"},{"Description":"Compliance issues with interventions, especially educational programmes","Impact":"Diminished effectiveness of low-cost interventions","Mitigation":"Implement strategies to improve compliance, such as incentives and educational support","Technologies":"Engagement tracking tools, behavior modification technology","People":"Study participants, educators, researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"}]}
